entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 5:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ESE 36 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle at times mixed with snow changing to snow this evening. Fog dissipating this evening. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm inland and over higher terrain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
